author: {'steamid': '76561199235409416', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1691776731}
review:
[h1]Recenzja Gry "Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links"[/h1]

"Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links" to wciągające spotkanie z popularnym uniwersum karcianych potyczek, które w przystępny sposób przenosi magię karcianych pojedynków na ekrany naszych urządzeń.

[b]Opinia o Grze:[/b]

Gra oferuje pełną adrenalinę rozgrywkę opartą na kultowej mechanice kart. Świetnie wyważona trudność i rozbudowana kampania zapewniają zarówno nowym, jak i doświadczonym graczom satysfakcjonujące wyzwania.

[b]Stylistyka:[/b]

Styl artystyczny oddaje charakterystyczny design postaci i kart, będąc wiernym odzwierciedleniem oryginalnego materiału źródłowego. Animacje są płynne, a oprawa wizualna przypomina charakterystyczne sceny z serii.

[b]Ścieżka Dźwiękowa:[/b]

Ścieżka dźwiękowa gry to hołd dla nostalgii, dzięki znakomitym aranżacjom muzycznym i efektom dźwiękowym. Towarzyszy ona dynamicznym pojedynkom, podnosząc napięcie rozgrywki.

[b]Grafika:[/b]

Grafika prezentuje się efektownie i pełna detali, zachowując autentyczność postaci i kart. Specjalne efekty w trakcie pojedynków dodają wrażeń, podkreślając siłę i unikalność poszczególnych kart.

[b]Silnik:[/b]

Silnik gry działa sprawnie, co przekłada się na płynność rozgrywki. To solidna podstawa dla satysfakcjonujących i dynamicznych pojedynków.

[b]Pomysł na Dalszy Rozwój:[/b]

Ewolucja gry mogłaby obejmować jeszcze więcej trybów rozgrywki, zróżnicowane eventy i urozmaicone wyzwania, aby utrzymać długotrwałe zainteresowanie.

[b]Wady:[/b]

Czasami elementy mikropłatności mogą wpłynąć na rywalizację
Dla nowych graczy nauka mechanik może być nieco złożona

[b]Zalety:[/b]

* Oddanie ducha serii i unikalnej mechaniki karcianych pojedynków
* Estetyczna oprawa wizualna i dźwiękowa
* Różnorodność kart i możliwość personalizacji decków

[b]Ocena ogólna: 9.0/10[/b] ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/44434850/] Obserwuj początkującego Kuratora [/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198142592490', 'num_games_owned': 442, 'num_reviews': 119, 'playtime_forever': 1548, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1548, 'last_played': 1511548537}
review:
I love it, for Yu-Gi-Oh! fans and for those like me who didn't know much about the subject as well, it's easy to understand the mechanics and so on. 10/10"

This was my review at the time but now I have a completely different opinion, at first everything is great but later on the game suffers from a big problem and that is that it has (like many others) to "update" or add more to stay, it is say that the META is constantly changing and that if you are not up to date your best combination of yesterday is the worst of today (in some cases, not always), but if you are really going to put "huev*" to this game if it is recommended, otherwise not.

I leave this positive review since the mechanics are understandable and the game is quite good, it sins of changing too much but it is necessary given its type, for me it is an 8/10 more than anything because I maintain the "it is easy to understand the mechanical and so on!

author: {'steamid': '76561198262061285', 'num_games_owned': 105, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1309, 'last_played': 1688738028}
review: If you hate meta, this game isn't for you... It basically FORCES you to play a meta deck if you want to get far in ranked... That's the problem with this game, it's relies on meta decks too much! Too many Vagabonds I go up against use an OTK deck... I can't do anything against it, the only character I seem to get semi-consistent wins with is Akiza! And that's ONLY because of Ruddy Rose Dragon! Wanna use your Elemental HERO deck? Say Good-bye to your sanity! Because the game will screw you over if you don't use a Meta deck, or something to counter a meta deck! Wanna have fun? NOPE! screwed over because META DECK! Wanna test out a new deck against the Vagabond? NOPE! META DECK YET AGAIN! This is what PISSES ME OFF ABOUT THE GAME! TOO MUCH META! Even IF they got rid of the new meta decks, people will find new ones! Make even more impossible to play against decks! Ruin the fun EVEN MORE FOR PEOPLE WHO JUST WANT A CASUAL EXPERIENCE!

author: {'steamid': '76561198140346873', 'num_games_owned': 27, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 41935, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1708, 'playtime_at_review': 18493, 'last_played': 1712483272}
review:
I entered this game after playing Master Duel not really liking this game initially. The grinding for things is a drag, I have to rely on rng to get the cards I want, and unlocking specific things take forever in this game....However, the moment I was able to have a functioning pvp deck, the game suddenly got really fun!

This game caters to the nostalgia of the people who are familiar with any of the Yu-Gi-Oh! manga and anime. Each character in this game comes with their own set of skills and voice lines that are mostly reminiscent to their source material. For example, I was able to clutch a victory with Yami Yugi using Miracle Draw to draw the one card I needed to win the whole duel. I even got to feel like a dirty cheater stealing my opponent's card with Bandit Keith's Bandit skill. I ran a Solfachord deck, so Yuya's United Pendulums skill is perfect with flooding the field with my monsters. 

If you are very familiar with any of the characters in this game, I recommend giving this game a shot! Due to the nature of this game, you will be spoiled if you have not kept up with all of the Yu-Gi-Oh! anime stories. Otherwise, the duel gameplay is pretty solid overall!

author: {'steamid': '76561198142970657', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 13196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13196, 'last_played': 1690094227}
review: The game for me started off fine at first. But as time when on, the game's PvP has become and more closer to the regular meta. With the recent card releases and the current state of PvP duels, I can say that the enjoyment of this game has plummeted for me. Reason why is that the meta of "not letting your opponent make a play and OTK" is becoming more apparent with decks such as Orcust and Shiranui. not to mention link monsters such as Knightmare Phoenix. Not only that, but the connection issue between players have become more commonplace, which is preventing smooth PvP duels. I have encountered this firsthand and it made PvP duels infuriating to play, as if Lady Luck has her hand on the wifi cable to pull the plug whenever she wants. Because of this, trying to attend events revolving around PvP has become more or less unplayable and unenjoyable in a nutshell. It was a fun game while it lasted, but unless Konami fixes these issues, then I'm pretty much done playing this. There are also speculations that my friends and I have on how Konami has a bias on whalers, but that's a can of worms I rather not open, as I said in my Master Duel review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198446697083', 'num_games_owned': 887, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 13170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9123, 'last_played': 1704417534}
review:
Antes que todo no se si todo el tiempo de juego que tengo se refleja en steam ya que lo juego de mediados del 2017, incluso lo hice diario por 2 años aprox pero lo jugaba del celular, bajado de playstore. Actualmente lo juego de vez en cuando por nada en especial, en fin, no le crean a los frustrados que dicen que el juego es P2W, realmente si tiene sus compras dentro del juego, cosa que nunca he usado y aun asi el progreso del juego fue muy bueno, no entiendo a la gente que habla mal de los eventos, cartas nuevas, comunidad, etc. quiza no es un juego para ese tipo de personas, para que te guste un juego como este o cualquier YuGiOh te debe gustar el genero principalmente y tambien el modo que tiene especialmente este juego, que no solo es obtencion de cartas y ya, sino que tiene dinamicas diarias y semanales permanentemente. Sin necesidad de llegar al farmeo podes juntar muchos consumibles y cartas del juego, solo dedicandole algo de tiempo, repito, debe gustarte el genero. Y por ultimo, si nunca jugaste algun juego de cartas o mas en especifico de esta saga no te recomiendo empezar, actualmente por como avanzó el juego es preferible licenciarte en alguna universidad o algo, es muy complicado aprender mecanicas, efectos, etc para la gente nueva, no es nada de otro mundo pero no creo que haya en nadie paciencia para hacerlo. 

Juego recomendadisimo para fans de la saga y si sos nuevo podes jugar con un amigo que ya sepa jugar, para que te tenga piedad porque en PvP nadie la tendrá jaja

author: {'steamid': '76561197989480761', 'num_games_owned': 1465, 'num_reviews': 138, 'playtime_forever': 72924, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72924, 'last_played': 1678574525}
review:
Modele très mauvais model économique, beaucoup de cartes inaccessible en 3 exemplaire sans payé. Taux de gemme pour le F2P très bas pour vous poussé un maximum à dépenser.
Pas de possibilité de craft des cartes ou de recyclé de façon utile les cartes en trop.

Je pense que le jeu devrait s'inspirer de master duel qui a un model économique plus équitable. Mais ça n'arrivera pas, car la nostalgie et le côté animé et mobile maintienne les vaches à lait sur le jeu.

Dommage, ça avait du potentiel, surtout la première année de sortie.

author: {'steamid': '76561198999022987', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 5350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1337, 'last_played': 1696737291}
review:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links é um jogo envolvente ambientado em uma dimensão paralela, reunindo personagens de todas as franquias para duelos épicos, proporcionando uma experiência expansiva. A direção de arte é excepcional, com animações, cartas, personagens e interfaces visualmente impressionantes. Os efeitos sonoros e as dublagens são cativantes e bem executados, contribuindo para a imersão do jogador.

Pontos positivos: 
    - É um excelente jogo ambientado no universo da franquia, oferecendo uma competição interessante e recompensas gratificantes para os vencedores. 
    - A atividade constante do jogo, com eventos que premiam os jogadores com cartas, personagens e habilidades, mantém o engajamento elevado. 
    - Apesar de ser um nicho, a comunidade é acolhedora e amigável. 
    - A disponibilidade tanto para dispositivos móveis quanto para PC é conveniente. 
    - A direção artística é original e bela, complementada por trilhas sonoras nostálgicas.

Pontos negativos: 
    - O jogo é excessivamente pay-to-win, com decks e cartas desbalanceadas caras. 
    - Torna-se cansativo e repetitivo sem decks competitivos. 
    - O suporte ao jogador é insatisfatório, refletindo a ganância da empresa.

Minha opnião: Minha experiência com Yu-Gi-Oh! começou por influência de um amigo, e rapidamente me apaixonei pelo jogo. Comecei no celular, mas perdi meu progresso ao trocar de dispositivo. Decidi recomeçar no PC, mas logo percebi que o jogo havia mudado consideravelmente desde então. Mesmo investindo tempo e dinheiro, a constante mudança no meta e o alto custo das cartas no Brasil tornaram difícil manter o ritmo. É desanimador pensar que mesmo um jogo que amo se tornou inacessível financeiramente. Espero que um dia Yu-Gi-Oh! se torne mais equilibrado e acessível para todos os jogadores.

author: {'steamid': '76561198198476302', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 2996, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1830, 'last_played': 1691459721}
review:
I got back into Yu-Gi-Oh after rewatching the episode where Yugi won Slifer from "Strings". Playing this game is FUN.

Want new cards? Play against the computer or real people and get them from simple objectives.
Want Ultra Rare cards? Daily rewards and mission rewards have your back.
Want to play against or as your favourite character? Steady progression lets you!

The only drawback is the 3 zones in the monster and spell/trap fields and a few other restrictions, but this is a blast that is on "zoomies" for fans of the game, anime, and franchise!

author: {'steamid': '76561198813140833', 'num_games_owned': 15, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 3460, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2047, 'last_played': 1700947955}
review:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links es un juego de cartas basado en la popular serie de anime y manga Yu-Gi-Oh! Conviértete en un duelista y sumérgete en un mundo lleno de estrategia, magia y monstruos en este adictivo juego de cartas para dispositivos móviles.

GRÁFICOS
🔲- Gráficos desactualizados y poco impresionantes
🔲- Aceptables, pero podrían ser más detallados
☑️- Vibrantes y visualmente atractivos, los personajes y las cartas cobran vida
🔲- Visualmente impresionantes, con animaciones espectaculares y efectos visuales llamativos

JUGABILIDAD
🔲- Torpe y difícil de entender
🔲- No muy emocionante, falta profundidad en las mecánicas del juego
☑️- Adictiva y satisfactoria, te sumerge en duelos estratégicos emocionantes
🔲- Muy satisfactoria, ofrece una experiencia completa y desafiante de duelo de cartas

VARIEDAD DE CARTAS
🔲- Poca variedad de cartas y limitadas opciones de construcción de mazos
🔲- Algunas cartas interesantes, pero la selección es limitada
☑️- Amplia variedad de cartas con diferentes atributos y efectos, permitiendo estrategias variadas
🔲- Una gran cantidad de cartas que brindan una infinidad de combinaciones para crear mazos únicos y poderosos

MODOS DE JUEGO
🔲- Modos limitados y repetitivos
🔲- Algunos modos interesantes, pero falta variedad
☑️- Diversos modos de juego, incluyendo duelos estándar, torneos y eventos especiales
🔲- Una amplia gama de modos que ofrecen desafíos constantes y novedades para los jugadores

COMUNIDAD
🔲- Tóxica y poco acogedora
🔲- Promedio, con altibajos en la interacción con otros jugadores
☑️- Mayormente amigable, con una comunidad dispuesta a ayudar y competir
🔲- Increíblemente solidaria, te hará sentir parte de una comunidad unida de duelistas

RECOMPENSAS Y PROGRESIÓN
🔲- Pocas recompensas y progresión lenta
🔲- Recompensas moderadas, pero la progresión puede ser tediosa
☑️- Generosas recompensas y una progresión equilibrada que te mantiene motivado para seguir avanzando
🔲- Abundantes recompensas y una progresión gratificante que te permite desbloquear contenido emocionante

RECOMIENDO ESTE JUEGO
🔲- No, no lo recomendaría
🔲- Solo si te gustan los juegos de cartas coleccionables
☑️- Sí, especialmente si eres fanático de Yu-Gi-Oh! y disfrutas de los duelos estratégicos
🔲- Definitivamente, es un imprescindible para los amantes de los juegos de cartas y la franquicia Yu-Gi-Oh!

PUNTUACIÓN GENERAL: 8.4/10

Recuerda que esta puntuación es una evaluación subjetiva y puede variar según las preferencias individuales. ¡Disfruta de los emocionantes duelos de cartas en Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links y demuestra tu habilidad como duelista! Si tienes alguna otra pregunta, ¡no dudes en hacerla!

author: {'steamid': '76561198073218369', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 24677, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24677, 'last_played': 1689366551}
review: Trop de variété tue la variété. Le jeu n'est pas pay2win et on peut rapidement avoir de bonne cartes mais la ou le jeu est totalement con et frustrant c'est que le pvp pue du cul puissance 1000. C'est quoi l'interet de mélanger les synchro, les xyz, les pendules et autres regles de merde sur un jeu fait pour tourner plus rapidement que le jeu normal. Faire des parties en 1 ou 2 tours n'a aucun interet. Et la plupart des kevins jouent les meme decks avec des regles de merde. Impossible de jouer comme on veut si on s'est arreté aux 1eres generation de cartes et en plus on comprend pas ce qui se passe. Bien joué Konami, vous etes des débiles.

review: I don't always have access to dueling people in person, so Duel Links is the perfect way to feed my need to battle. It's free, which allows access even easier. Lots of in-game purchases can also be bought with gems, so no money is needed. The game provides great tutorials, cards, and opponents to battle. I would recommend this game to new duelists, people who just want to battle, and even Duelists who are looking to challenge the best.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073929645', 'num_games_owned': 100, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 60800, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 434, 'last_played': 1704398391}
review:
The first online Yu-Gi-Oh game that I played. I played this game a lot in my phone and good thing that I can play it on my laptop too! I'll just warning you that this game can be addicted even if you would like to be as a F2P only, as there are countless of events and rewards that you can get within the game that can let you select cards that you want and gems to spend while trying to draw the card that you wanted within the game. 

Just an advice for new players 
- Try to search what is the current meta if you are a competitive person but be aware that those decks can be pretty expensive but still can be build by F2P by how much time you grind within the game and events. 
- There are plenty of F2P starter builds that doesn't require money or too much time on grinding as the deck I have been using was either the blue eyes deck and my favorite simple deck, "Red-Eyes Fusion Deck".
- Red-Eyes fusion deck is kinda a best F2P deck that I played since it can easily beat other players within just few rounds and you don't really need to spend so much time learning the spells and can be pretty annoy your opponents and of course also you (if you ever get matched against Red-Eyes fusion deck player)
- The good thing is that even if you have Red-Eyes fusion deck, you can still adjust some of the cards that you want to counter other decks like what I have done to my deck which makes the game pretty much interesting. 
- And finally, who doesn't want to collect those Exodia Deck, Egyptian Gods, and many cards from the original first Yu-Gi-Oh series.

author: {'steamid': '76561198169828093', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 41974, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 502, 'playtime_at_review': 22020, 'last_played': 1712455507}
review:
Esse jogo pode ser grátis mas não é um jogo para POBRES!!! Nunca dei 1 centavo para Konami e para grindar nesse jogo de forma F2P foram necessários 7 anos. Lógico que quando comecei não tinham tantas cartas e arquétipos como tem hoje em dia no game e por isso foi mais "tranquilo" de grindar, porém não recomendo ninguém a iniciar no jogo hoje em dia a não ser que esteja preparado pra gastar seu dinheiro em pacotes de cartas ao melhor estilo FIFA Ultimate Team.

Em questão de gameplay e competitivo o jogo é muito bom, representa exatamente a vontade que tinha quando criança de duelar contra outras pessoas como era no anime. Por outro lado a cada novo lançamento de arquétipo de cartas o competitivo sofre, pois essas novas cartas "parecem" ser imunes a Bricks fazendo com que o jogador/oponente compre exatamente as cartas necessárias para executar combos de forma fatal rapidamente e sem qualquer chance de reação.

author: {'steamid': '76561199235303105', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 817, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1710897253}
review:
Para los jugadores más veteranos de Yu-Gi-Oh! y del anime, es el juego ideal. Junta los personajes más emblemáticos de todas las series, y te sientes uno siendo un personaje diferente. Es interesante el sistema de animaciones y sobre todo que todo fluye muy bien con el gameplay, a veces los jugadores se esmeran en ganar con combos (como en la actualidad), sin embargo, los duelistas estándar son aquellos que te salvan de jugar al competitivo y complejo Yu-Gi-Oh! de la actualidad, y solo usas el sistema base del juego de cartas.
Sin duda, un gran juego con doblaje en inglés e idioma original en japonés.

author: {'steamid': '76561198167356491', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 29592, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29525, 'last_played': 1707686825}
review:
It's not 100% real YuGiOh due to the 3 card monster and spell/trap limit as well as no Main Phase 2. If you're looking to learn real YuGiOh either download YGOPro or/and buy Legacy of the Duelist here on steam.

Here is a list of the differences from real TCG yugioh and Duel Links:
-Both players start with 4000LP
-Both players begin with 4 cards in their hand
-Main Phase 2 is completely absent from the game. In other words, after your battle phase is complete you must end your turn.
-There are only 3 monster and spell/trap card zones on the playing field.
-20card decks are the minimun.
-30card decks are the maximum.
-5 Monsters in extra deck is the maximum.
-No Synchro, XYZ, Pendelum OR Link summons.
-Characters will unlock a "skill" as they level which can be attached to a deck individually and activated in a duel when the conditions are met. For example, Yami Yugi has an ability called "Power of Dark" which allows him to play "Yami" at the very beginning of the duel for free right after the coin toss. The card is materialized from thin air and does not come from his deck.

With these differences some cards in this version of YGO are a lot more powerful due to the lower LP start and smaller decks. So you can definitely have some quick fun and pull off combos that you probably could hardly do in official YGO. Also, the voice acting is very nicely done.


For some people the differences between Duel Links and offical YGO may be a turn off. So I just want to make sure that you know the rules of this game and what you're getting into before you start investing in it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198257682341', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 749, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 749, 'last_played': 1683304964}
review:
Reminder che ho un telegram, è molto bello e dovreste iscrivervi: https://t.me/nuskaclub

Quella che state per leggere non sarà una recensione vera e propria come quelle che ho scritto di recente, la considerò più una raccolta di pensieri sparsi e soggettivi, in quanto non mi ritengo pienamente qualificato a parlare di Yugioh come gioco di carte.
Duel Links è un approccio più veloce e compatto del TGC, con un deck limitato a 20-30 carte, life points tagliati a metà e 3 spazi per magie e mostri rispetto ai soliti 5.
Oltre a questo, esiste anche la presenza di personaggi selezionabili a rappresentarti in ogni duello, ognuno con un set di abilità che possono variare dall'aumento occasionale di certe statistiche, all'evocazione di magie terreno e molto altro.
Oltre che puntare le cose più ovvie, come il ritmo dei duelli, non posso fare un paragone diretto col TGC perché, come ho detto, di quello che succede lì so troppo poco per esprimermi, so solo che la mia esperienza online fin'ora è stata tutto sommato molto divertente.
Questo è il mio terzo tentativo di farmi piacere Duel Links, e fin'ora è quello che si è dimostrato più fruttuoso, ma ci sono parecchie cose che non mi piacciono e su cui posso elaborare anche con la mia conoscenza limitata di ciò che succede nella serie dopo i Synchro, molte delle quali incolpabili alla natura free-to-play dell'app più che al formato di gioco.
Ero un gran fan della serie Tag Force da piccolo, quando non avevo nessuno con cui potevo giocare a Yugioh era il diversivo ideale. Realisticamente, dovrei aspettarmi lo stesso livello di qualità dal single player di Duel Links? Non credo sia giusto. Anche se fosse un gioco a prezzo pieno il suo punto forte è ovviamente l'online, che in termini di contenuti e varietà non mi dà da lamentarmi.
Detto questo, è una merda, e considerato quanto sia importante come fonte di grinding penso valga la pena spenderci su due parole.
Ogni "trama" è suddivisa dalla serie di appartenenza, dentro al quale potrai usare tutti suoi i personaggi attinenti, per fare un esempio: in GX putrai usare Jaiden e non Yusei. Si comincerà da Duel Monsters e col tempo sbloccherai tutte le altre serie.
Nulla di sbagliato con questo approccio, è tutto il resto che non mi piace.
L'avrete probabilmente già intuito, ma parola trama l'ho messa fra virgolette un paio di frasi perché descriverla come tale è essere generosi. Riconosco che forse mi sto lamentando per qualcosa di cui dovrei aver chissà che aspettative, ma a me gli anime di Yugioh piacciono e i Tag Force avevano giusto un pochino di mordente in più, se vogliamo parlare strettamente di videogiochi, è così tanto chiedere una storia decente? Boh.
Un'altro problema è quanto sballata sia la difficoltà dei duelli in generale. Mentre tu sei online a sperimentare con Pendulum e Xys già dalle prime ore di gioco i tuoi avversari in single player useranno mostri vanilla con meno di 1000 punti d'attacco per una porzione ridicola di trama.
Questo grinding è parzialmente alleggerito dalla presenza di auto-duelli che puoi tenere in background, ma anche appesantito dal respawn di duellanti molto lento.
Anche l'online non è esente da difetti, però, e dopo essermi abituato così bene con Pokémon Showdown devo dire che la mancanza di una separazione netta fra i formati delle varie saghe mi ha lasciato un po' deluso. Mi ricordo ancora i primissimi tempi di Duel Links, quando ancora dovevano introdurre i Synchro e il metagame era completamente diverso da quello di adesso, e ritengo un spreco che quei giorni non possano più tornare. Alla fine stiamo parlando di Yugioh, non credo che la fanbase sia così piccola da creare problemi se si tengono assieme più di un formato allo stesso tempo, no? Magari è una richiesta irragionevole, ma leggere di come certe carte vecchie e ritenute inutili di 20 anni fa abbiano trovato una nicchia rilevante in Duel Links durante vari punti nella storia competitiva dell'app mi fa venir voglia di poterci sperimentare io stesso, e so che non posso perché non sarebbe più fattibile nel meta corrente. Intanto, però, se guardo in Showdown ci sono ancora sviluppi per il meta della terza generazione, cosa permessa dal fatto che esiste una separazione netta fra essa e ciò che viene prima o dopo.
Mah.
Poi vabè, le solite lamentele da gacha, che però devo dire si applicano anche al gioco di carte originale quindi non è che posso dire più di tanto.

author: {'steamid': '76561199468645753', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1688417698}
review: Как человек наигравший в эту игру 300 часов, могу сказать что игра плоха. Плоха не настолько что в неё вообще не стоит играть. Играть можно но с большим терпением или желанием тратить много времени. Начать могу с того что игра просто банальная гриндилка. Ведь только таким методом можно заработать драгоценные самоцветы за которые можно купить бустеры, ведь только так их можно достать. Но вы не собирёте колоду сразу. Ведь в одном бустере лежит всего 3 карты, 3 сраные карты. А бустеров там может быть 200, 180, 100, 80. Но есть карты которых всего 1 или 2 боксе, и чтобы выбить их из бокса нужно его сбросить и опять начинать по новой. Из-за этого игра может очень сильно надоедать.

author: {'steamid': '76561198387979731', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1983, 'last_played': 1707015811}
review: I enjoyed playing Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links. It's simple and interesting to play because it's a miniature version of Yu-Gi-Oh. Certain cards are limited or restricted to ensure that everyone has an enjoyable experience. There are many characters to play and many cards to obtain. You can level up characters to earn rewards such as card, gems, coins, etc. In addition, there are many available game modes including dueling quizzes, PvC, PvP, casual duels, turbo duels, legacy duels, etc. All the different types of Special Summons are supported including Fusion, Synchro, XYZ, and Link Summoning. However, as more is added to the game, it negatively affects the gameplay experience. The majority of duels are being decided in the first few turns. Spells or Traps that can be activated when a monster declares a attack are less effective because most players are smart enough to destroy them. Players rely on cheap antics to get ahead. Regardless, it's a great game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198206392496', 'num_games_owned': 54, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 241473, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 5107, 'playtime_at_review': 109229, 'last_played': 1712492722}
review:
Avis mitigés.
Le jeu est factuellement bon mais les mises à jour régulière empêche parfois les banlist ou la méta de bougé au bon moment mais cela à aussi ces avantages parfois.
Le problème réside dans l'économie même du jeu qui fait que si vous êtes un nouveau joueur ou que si vous avez fait une pause vous ne pourrez pas rattrapé votre retard vis à vis dans la collection ce qui dans les fait vous bloquera dès que vous voudrez vous amusez en pve ou même testé des archétypes.
Si jamais vous êtes fan des animés vous aurez des compétences appropriés pour favoriser les archétypes de ceux ci, ce qui est vraiment agréable.
Les événements PvE sont intéressant même si certain dur vraiment longtemps (genre 2,5 semaine alors que la plupart des événements dure 10 jour). Je salut les événement pvp pour leur innovation et pour répartir en niveau pas comme en classé.
Les classés bien que j'ai un peux de mal avec ce concept que l'on retrouve dans absolument tous les jeux en ligne sont comme d'habitude le seul mod pvp pris en compte par le jeu.
Enfin bref je n'aime pas le pvp dans yugioh de un à cause des timer(beaucoup trop court et surtout stressant pour rien) et de deux à cause des métas. Le pve étant le moteur du jeu mais sans plus (dommage ou tant mieux c'est l'avis de chacun)
Le rush duel, qui est un autre format du jeux, est pour le moment beaucoup trop jeune et les decks qui fonctionnent ne sont pas forcément les mieux penser néanmoins je fonde de (trop grand) espoir sur ce mode.

author: {'steamid': '76561198803090584', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 6763, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6763, 'last_played': 1554331727}
review:
Um jogo muito bom, onde simplificaram o modo de jogar e deixaram ele mais divertido e fluido. 
Sistema para adquirir cartas também é muito fácil, intuitivo e divertido.
Recomendo totalmente, qualquer um pode jogar com facilidade, tendo os modos offlines onde vc pode desafiar npcs ou os modos onlines onde ai sim vc pode estudar a fundo e fazer as melhores combinações para ganhar

review: For every Yu-Gi-Oh fan, from the most hardcore to the casual. I'd say its USP among all the other Yu-Gi-Oh video games is you get to hear the voice actors reprising their roles, including big legends like Eric Stuart, Wayne Grayson, Bella Hudson and of course Dan 'The Man' Green! The variety of skills available to each playable/unlockable character means there is plenty of mix-ups you can make which prevents the single player (at least) from going stale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061064208', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 9939, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9939, 'last_played': 1636421456}
review:
Yu-Gi-Oh!: Duel Links to niesamowicie wciągająca gra karciana dla fanów serii anime i karcianek. Już od pierwszych chwil w grze można poczuć ogromną dawkę nostalgii, kiedy wracamy do światowej sławy karcianych pojedynków Yu-Gi-Oh!.

Jedną z najbardziej atrakcyjnych cech tej gry jest jej prostota i dostępność. Interfejs jest intuicyjny, a sam proces rozgrywki został uproszczony, aby pasował do formatu mobilnego. Dzięki temu, nawet nowi gracze mogą łatwo zrozumieć zasady gry i cieszyć się emocjonującymi pojedynkami.

Yu-Gi-Oh!: Duel Links oferuje ogromną różnorodność kart, z których możemy budować swoje talie. Możemy znaleźć kultowe karty znane z anime, ale także nowe, ekskluzywne dodatki stworzone specjalnie dla tej gry. Budowanie talii i eksperymentowanie z różnymi strategiami stanowi prawdziwą frajdę, a możliwość personalizacji swojego decku sprawia, że każdy pojedynek jest unikalny.

Wielkim atutem gry jest również jej dynamiczność i szybkie tempo rozgrywki. Walki są dynamiczne, a decyzje trzeba podejmować szybko i strategicznie. To sprawia, że pojedynki są ekscytujące i pełne napięcia, nie dając graczy chwili wytchnienia.

Dodatkowo, w grze znajduje się rozbudowany tryb wieloosobowy, w którym możemy zmierzyć się z innymi graczami online. To prawdziwa gratka dla osób, które chcą sprawdzić swoje umiejętności i strategie w rywalizacji z innymi graczami z całego świata.

Grafika w grze jest świetnie wykonana, oddając charakterystyczny styl Yu-Gi-Oh! i przekazując atmosferę emocjonujących pojedynków. Efekty specjalne, animacje kart i ikoniczne postacie z serii dodają grze jeszcze większego uroku.

Podsumowując, Yu-Gi-Oh!: Duel Links to wciągająca i ekscytująca przygoda dla fanów serii. Prosta rozgrywka, szeroki wybór kart, dynamiczne pojedynki i rozbudowany tryb wieloosobowy sprawiają, że gra ta zapewnia wiele godzin świetnej zabawy. Niezależnie od tego, czy jesteś fanem Yu-Gi-Oh! czy nowicjuszem w świecie karcianek, ta gra jest wartą uwagi propozycją dla każdego, kto chce doświadczyć emocji i strategii tego popularnego uniwersum karcianek.

author: {'steamid': '76561198857280050', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 63079, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60185, 'last_played': 1708913225}
review: Its very addictive if you like the show and card game! Uses original voice actors and characters for every series from the first to v-rains.  Only 4000 life points like the show so it will be quick duels most of the time. Also adds character abilities to play key cards from the deck. Updates a lot for the forbidden/restricted list to keep the meta fresh and fair. It can be free to play if you attack it using your newbie rewards and grinding tools to form one deck so you can climb ranked. if you wanna have more fun with it you gotta be willing to spend on their deals for packs which can add up to high amounts of $. The game is good overall.

author: {'steamid': '76561199102505423', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 884, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 884, 'last_played': 1680719573}
review:
No começo pode ser uma experiência boa para os fãs do anime.. nostalgia maravilhosa.

E antes de mais nada.. sim, você deveria jogar para alimentar a nostalgia.

Agora, pra jogar sério mesmo ou se dedicar, o negócio muda um pouco.

O problema que pode fazer você parar assim como eu parei é que a mecânica dos decks está insuportável a ponto de você não conseguir manter 20 segundos de partida.

Como está hoje: se você não tirar seu combo na primeira rodada, o seu oponente te destrói na rodada dele. Ou vice-versa, se na primeira rodada você conseguir seu combo, o oponente não vai conseguir desenvolver a rodada dele e você ganha a partida na sua próxima rodada. Sem sacanagem, +90% das partidas acabam na segunda ou terceira rodada por causa das mecânicas das cartas, dos combos ridículos, sincronizações, etc... é impossível desenvolver táticas ou algo parecido. A única coisa que você precisa é puxar seu combo primeiro que seu oponente. Isso chegou num ponto tão ridículo que depois de um tempo perde a graça jogar.

Eu vejo muitas pessoas reclamando da dificuldade de farmar gemas para conseguir bons decks, mas eu nem vou comentar sobre isso porque jogos assim levam tempo mesmo para quem não pões seu dinheiro real. Como um bom jogador free to play, a gente tem que ser persistente e isso demora muito (foram muitos, muitos, muitos meses para conseguir montar meus decks de forma descente (jogava mais no celular, não no PC)).

author: {'steamid': '76561198247167278', 'num_games_owned': 166, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 60307, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 77, 'playtime_at_review': 59342, 'last_played': 1712448570}
review:
Title: "Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links: A Gacha Roller Coaster of Unfairness"

Rating: ★★☆☆☆

Oh, Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, you tantalizing digital card game with your flashy animations and nostalgic duels. However, beneath the surface lies a gacha-infested world where fairness takes a back seat and frustration becomes your closest companion. This review aims to shed light on the game's unbalanced nature, leaving players at the mercy of unpredictable luck and pay-to-win mechanics.

Let's address the elephant in the room: the gacha system. Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links relies heavily on randomized card packs, promising rare and powerful cards that can turn the tide of any duel. But here's the catch—these packs are often designed to drain your virtual wallet faster than you can say "Exodia, obliterate!" The game's obsession with microtransactions and the constant urge to spend real money to get an edge over opponents can quickly turn the experience into a frustrating and expensive endeavor.

Moreover, the rarity of certain cards creates a gaping chasm between players. Those lucky enough to pull rare and coveted cards have a significant advantage, while others are left struggling with lackluster decks. This imbalance tilts the playing field and turns duels into predictable outcomes, where luck matters more than skill. It's disheartening to invest time and effort into building a strategic deck, only to be consistently outmatched by players who simply lucked out on their gacha pulls.

The game's progression system is equally flawed. Duel Links heavily restricts access to certain cards and deck archetypes behind an artificial progression wall. This means that players who are unwilling or unable to spend copious amounts of time or money are left with limited options, stifling their creativity and strategic choices. It's disheartening to see the potential for diverse and unique decks, only to realize that they're locked away behind an unfair progression system.

Additionally, the reliance on pay-to-win mechanics takes away from the true essence of the Yu-Gi-Oh! experience. The game should be about strategic thinking, deck building, and outsmarting opponents. However, it becomes a mere race to acquire the rarest cards and overpower your opponents through brute force rather than skillful play. This shift in focus undermines the competitive nature of the game and leaves a bitter taste for players seeking a fair and balanced dueling experience.

In conclusion, Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links may offer a visually appealing trip down memory lane with its beloved characters and iconic duels. However, the game's heavy reliance on gacha mechanics, unfair progression systems, and pay-to-win elements tarnish the experience. It transforms what should be a strategic and skill-based card game into an unbalanced, frustrating, and financially draining endeavor. Proceed with caution, duelists, as the path to dueling greatness in Duel Links is paved with unfairness and disappointment.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068527419', 'num_games_owned': 172, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 2904, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2904, 'last_played': 1683733736}
review:
Yu-Gi-Oh is better than pokemon or any other cartoon there is.
About this game. Has a lot of cards to chose from. It's free. User friendly, excluding those pop ups and random events that may not be easy to skip, and you'd need to sit through them for 10 minutes. Game gives you lots of opportunities to get new cards for your collection and is overall user-friendly. The only downside for me would be that there is not enough cards for me. I'd love for it to have more of them. 

Regarding PvP. People use only one deck mainly, whatever may be in the meta / new cards added to the game. Everyone plays the same deck, there is just no variety. I myself have beloved the Toon Deck, and mixed it with red-dragon(s) cards, where i have seen only 3 people out of thousands that i've played, use Toon decks...

I all of my 1800 PvP fights, i have encountered 9 decks. 
Nine -- Decks in 1,800 Fights.
Everyone plays the same thing. Same tactics. Most of the people either leave for 170 seconds during the match forcing you to surrender not to waste your life on an AFK Opponent; where they'd come back after those 170 seconds to play, and rush their rounds to get some Time back (round limit is 180 seconds), or they would just move so slowly, that you could take a nap while the guy is thinking whether to set a card A or a card B...

review:
no.

I just happen to be a fan because I had fake printed cards from the show before moving to the states as a kid, AND they are very careful about how many games related to this show they keep alive to pigeon hole everyone who is a fan into the same game. Otherwise I wouldn't even be in here.

I have no hope they will improve anything ever. I play occasionally and did not try master duels because Im kinda done. Minute this game dies is the minute im done with this game forever and don't touch anything else related to the franchise. 

Konami, I spend money on what I want, get in my face about it and I make it a point to stay f2p forever. Greedy fucks.

review: Definitivamente um dos jogos existentes. Um jogo rápido, viciante e cheio de gacha safados envolvidos. Bem padrão daqueles que você roubaria o cartão da sua mãe, pra comprar cartinha nova. Porém, é sempre chato apanhar pra aqueles que possuem o coração das cartas (conhecimento de todos os combos apelões). E é sempre chato roubar o cartão da mãe.

author: {'steamid': '76561198797504920', 'num_games_owned': 107, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 28965, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 562, 'playtime_at_review': 16754, 'last_played': 1712233504}
review:
O jogo é injusto, p2w, chat uma merda, eventos meia bocas, empresa xenofóbica (achismo), mesmo não conseguindo ficar extremamente forte no meta independente do esforço feito, se for esperto dá pra ficar forte sem gastar nada, porém demanda tempo demais pra deixar o deck utilizável em eventos como a KC, e até montar o baralho o meta já mudou, ent o F2P sempre vai ficar 10 passos atrás de quem gasta. Porém, apesar disso, eu amo essa porra desse jogo, graças a ele eu fiquei ultra desacostumado com o TCG, por conta da polemica mecânica de skill, q particularmente achei foi uma inovação e tanto pra deixar o jogo mais divertido e dinâmico, enfim... 

Recomendo? Talvez, sinceramente, não sei muito se vale a pena kkkkk 
Tem que ser muito fã da série pra conseguir gostar desse jogo, mas isso daí vai de cada um  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

author: {'steamid': '76561198321540101', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 6253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6253, 'last_played': 1595416722}
review:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links est un véritable trésor pour les fans du célèbre jeu de cartes à collectionner. Dès le début, on est plongé dans un monde captivant où les duels prennent vie d'une manière totalement immersive. Les graphismes sont magnifiques, avec des animations fluides et des illustrations détaillées qui donnent vie aux monstres emblématiques de Yu-Gi-Oh!.

Ce qui rend Duel Links encore plus spécial, c'est son approche stratégique simplifiée qui permet aux joueurs de se lancer rapidement dans des duels intenses. Les règles ont été adaptées pour offrir une expérience de jeu plus rapide et plus dynamique, sans pour autant sacrifier la profondeur stratégique. On peut construire son deck, collecter des cartes et développer des stratégies pour battre ses adversaires.

Le mode en ligne est un vrai régal. On peut défier des joueurs du monde entier, tester ses compétences et améliorer son classement. Les événements réguliers et les tournois ajoutent une dose d'excitation supplémentaire, offrant aux joueurs la possibilité de gagner des récompenses exclusives et de se mesurer aux meilleurs duellistes de la communauté.

L'humour est également présent dans Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, avec des personnages emblématiques de la série animée qui interagissent de manière amusante pendant les duels. Les dialogues et les animations des personnages ajoutent une touche légère et divertissante à l'expérience, ce qui rend les moments de jeu encore plus agréables.

En conclusion, Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links est un jeu de cartes à collectionner qui réussit à capturer l'essence de l'univers de Yu-Gi-Oh! tout en offrant une expérience de jeu rapide, stratégique et divertissante. Avec ses graphismes magnifiques, son mode en ligne compétitif et son humour bien dosé, ce jeu est un véritable plaisir pour les fans et les nouveaux venus. Préparez-vous à affronter vos adversaires avec style et à laisser votre Deck devenir le roi des duels !

author: {'steamid': '76561198347770600', 'num_games_owned': 22, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 185488, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1869, 'playtime_at_review': 163842, 'last_played': 1712057314}
review:
듀링 4년동안 하고있는유저

무과금으로 이게임 불가능하다 는 아니고 시간많이투자해야함(무과금이겜못해빼애액하시는분들 마듀가서도 똑같음)
-지금시작하시는 분들은 도레미, 스피드로이드 하세요-

-가장높은 티어권덱을 초반에 만드는것은 비추 -
듀링은 1티어네 어 너 너프 이것만 무한루프라 왠만해서 금제감안해서 만드는거아니면 비추드림
(왠만한 금제는 kc대회나 세계대회 한 후 2주~~3주사이에 발표됨 거기서 스킬도 많이쓰면 그 스킬도 너프)

듀링에도 칩이라는게 생겼는데 1번팩부터 10번팩만 가능 초보유저한테는좋으나 팩다깐 사람한테는 안좋음
(12000에 칩100사는거보다 750보석으로 구입하세요)

무과금분들이나 소과금 분들이 이렇게만 알아두시면되고  과금하시는분들은 원하시는것하면됩니다 대신 금제로 타격이크면 비추

-지금 현 유희왕(듀링,마듀)-
마듀:티아라 씹x(이제 비스트티아라 씹)
듀링: 오르페골, 오드페골, 오오오페골,기황페골, 너두 나두 페골섞기 우욱

듀링에 지른게 크고 덱이 듀링이 더만아서 주로하게되었음::(솔직히티아라 보기역ㄱ..)

참고로 폰까지하면 4800~5000됩니다::

author: {'steamid': '76561198976571265', 'num_games_owned': 18, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 85, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1686021253}
review:
Insert you and friend playing this game*

So you're playing as Kaiba and they're playing as Yugi. 
You've drawn blue eyes, a defense block, attack block, and samurai card which you decide to play.
You realize you could use Blue eyes but the opportunity won't arrive for some time. 
Your opponent (Yugi Goodman) finds themselves in a bit of a bind. 
You draw another card which allows you to build up your field rather well, they however lack the cards and attack power to defend.
You draw one more card in this instance to have 3 cards in attack, two face down available at any time.
They ask for mercy around this time and you accept to let things build up in intensity (You have blue eyes ready.)
They have lemon magician on the field and a continuous spell which enables an effect. 
They are able to summon one more card due to this effect, it's another magician. 
You set this magician in defense using one of your face-down cards, you kill this magician. 
They draw a card, it has around 1900 atk thus overpowering your wall of monsters. Consequentially leaving you with only two. 
You ask for mercy and they say "It's only fair."
With your two remaining cards, tribute summon blue eyes.
Blue eyes in this moment would destroy everyone and win the game.

You (foolishly and stupidly) don't attack with blue eyes the moment you're able to.
You draw one card next to blue eyes, it's an armored dragon thing. 3-4 stars, low in comparison to blue eyes.
Afterwards they reveal that they've gotten a fusion summon card but is unaware on how to use it. 
They (Use it on whim). 

Note: They are Yugi and have built their entire deck around Dark magician. 

Their fusion summon brings Dark Magicians (Dark Magician and Dark magican girl.) Not enough to defeat blue eyes, but at this point in the battle it could kill my armored dragon.
My turn: I draw and end it hoping to extend the battle further, expecting them to reciprocate this as it's been. 
Note: This is just an assumption, I didn't openly state this. (My LP is moderately low right now due to my attack failing earlier and the effect of their earlier card.)

It's their turn, I have blue eyes and the armored dragon. 
They kill me with magicians by attacking the dragon.
I just stare at the screen while kaiba screams in agony.
Blue eyes stares back at me.
I realize my mistake and swear revenge. 
They believed in the heart of the cards. 
I believed in mutually assured destruction. (Blue eyes would've solo'd, nothing was mutual. Just a skill issue tbh.) 

Moral of the story, great game if you play it long enough. 7/10. Easy to understand and play. If you get blue eyes, just use it right off the bat. You've got nothing to lose except the damn game. F the heart of the cards.

author: {'steamid': '76561199015533393', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1589631730}
review: I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, picked my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.

author: {'steamid': '76561198848092855', 'num_games_owned': 2, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 901, 'playtime_at_review': 2791, 'last_played': 1712317768}
review:
Giochino cacha pay to win, totalmente brainless ed ogni partita in rank è scriptata. 

Puoi crearti il deck che vuoi, seguire le tierlist nelle community online, ma è solo la combinazione di molta fortuna e molti soldi spesi a farti arrivare in alto. 
Non c'è una reale bravura o competizione, tutto si basa su skills dei personaggi sbloccabili e carte comprate attraverso soldi reali... visto che su diversi box dove sono sbustabili 100 carte in totale, solo alcune possono essere sbustate con le gemme. 
Per farti un giro completo di sbustamenti di alcune box, sei obbligato a comprare e spendere soldi reali (e neanche pochi). 

Ti prende per i colori e gli effetti grafici che ti sparaflashano sullo schermo i premi, come se stessi giocando alle slot machine (poco ci manca a non renderlo tale) e per i nostalgici della serie... ma i veri giochi sono ormai sepolti da decenni nella tomba insieme alle vecchie console dove veramente ti divertivi e non c'erano script che decidevano il tuo destino nella rank.

review:
Can be a fun experience for anime fans, or Yu-Gi-Oh! players that are not too focused on a competitive PvP environment.

Gem economy is a nightmare. Be ready to open your wallet if you are even remotely interested in building more than one semi-competitive Deck.

Events, unfortunately, are becoming more and more repetitive.

review:
Genau so, wie man das selbst immer spielen wollte :)
Gratisspiel.
Und man kann so endlos Karten sammeln und verdienen, unglaublich.
Es ist so balanciert das man das Paytowin/freemium kein bisschen benötigt, denn irgendwas wo man allerlei Zeug zum Karten ergattern bekommt-oder Karten und Decks direkt erhält ist immer.
Einfach reinzocken, und es wird Duell für Duell grandioser, riesiger,ergänzender und artenreicher.
Ich liebe es :)

review: Un juego demasiado pensado en conseguir dinero. Es muy difícil conseguir gemas para armarte un deck. Requieres farmear todos los eventos por meses. Por lo tanto, tienes que pensarlo muy bien antes de armarte un deck, de lo contrario, no podrás jugar competitivamente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050507536', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 106701, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98663, 'last_played': 1702913688}
review: Pretty good if you want to get into yugioh without as much of the card pool and a bit more simplicity to the game. Skills allow for decks which never saw competitive use in the TCG to be usable if not high tier, which is a lot of fun to see. Gameplay itself is a bit monotonous, especially if you are wanting to grind out all the achievements, but some of it is remedied by the auto-duel feature. Gem economy is pretty trash, but that's nothing new for this genre of game, so unless you are willing to drop lots of money to play certain decks, I would recommend looking online for decks that are competitive but also not to expensive. I have managed to build several competitive decks and have spent less than $10 total on this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198894577902', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 11228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11228, 'last_played': 1580507613}
review: Eu sou um pai de 45 anos, provavelmente uma das pessoas mais velhas a jogar este jogo. Sou pai solteiro criando meu filho, que agora tem 14 anos. Meu filho ganhou este jogo no Natal de 2021 de seu tio, então o instalamos em seu computador e ele começou a jogar. Até o final da semana ele tinha 24 horas neste jogo. Isso foi horrível para mim, pois já era difícil encontrar maneiras de passar o tempo com meu filho, pois ele está sempre com os amigos ou apenas assistindo ao YouTube. Então eu decidi fazer uma conta no Steam e pegar esse jogo para ver se eu poderia jogar ao lado dele. Eu comprei o jogo, escolhi meu personagem e comecei a jogar, mas eu estava preso no que você deveria fazer. Pedi ajuda ao meu filho e ele organizou um jogo para eu participar. Adorei, pois foi o melhor momento que passei com meu filho desde que minha esposa morreu. Desde então, esse jogo aproximou eu e meu filho novamente e agora passamos um tempo juntos fora de casa também. Este jogo me lembrou que há diversão em tudo, e trouxe muitas lembranças felizes para mim e meu filho.

author: {'steamid': '76561198360978667', 'num_games_owned': 106, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 27412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24219, 'last_played': 1711139582}
review:
Allora, iniziamo dicendo che questo gioco l'ho iniziato a giocare grazie a una cara amica, e dopo 400 ore di gioco direi che sono più che in grado di esprimere il mio parere a riguardo. Iniziamo subito così finiamo va.


La trama:

Abbastanza ignorante e simpatica da piacermi, in breve esiste un mondo virtuale chiamato Duel World dove i duellanti di tutti gli archi narrativi possono ritrovarsi e duellare. Semplice, carino e no sense come tutto il franchise, quindi passabile.


Il Gameplay:

Vi son piaciute le 3 righe di commenti positivi sopra? Bene, perché sono le uniche che leggerete in tutta la fottuta recensione. Se siete fan sfegatati di sto gioco preparatevi, perché sto per smontare pezzo per pezzo questo schifo di gioco. Partiamo dalla costruzione deck: o avete tante gemme da spendere o vi attaccate e tirate forte, PUNTO. Aggiungiamo anche il fatto che nelle box dove si trovano le carte le Ultra Rare queste ultime saranno limitate a 1 FOTTUTA COPIA PER BOX e vi cadranno le palle solo dopo aver capito quale sarà la probabilità per ottenerle. Ah già, ci sono i coupon da sogno, che te le fanno ottenere subito, ma te ne danno 1 SOLO PER RARITA' una volta ogni cambio di shampoo di Brad Pitt. Dimenticavo, SCORDATEVI di giocare for fun, su Duel Links credo ci sia la tana della feccia della community di Yu-Gi-Oh: tutti giocatori frustrati che prendendo calci in culo nella vita vera e piangendo come dei bambini di 5 anni si rintanano in sto aborto di gioco per sfogarsi sui più deboli utilizzando i loro mazzi shoppati, e sto parlando sul serio: ho fatto un periodo giocando un mazzo old Chazz, con carte tipo Soldato Chthoniano, Polimerizzatore Chthoniano, X Testa Cannone... neanche il tempo di evocare normalmente Zombie Rinato, carta totalmente innocua sia di statistiche che di effetti, che sti bebè attivano Libro Della Luna o Buco Trappola Chiuso per mettermelo coperto. Solo con amici si riesce a giocare for fun, unico motivo per il quale sto tenendo il gioco, e giocando da PC c'è una connessione che non fa schifo, PEGGIO. 4 volte su 6 che inizio un duello o faccio una qualsiasi azione parte il solito messaggio "nEssuN4 c0nn3SS10n3 di r3t3!1!!1", quando ho tacche PIENE di connessione. Ma vi pesa il culo curare un po' di più il vostro gioco Konami? Bilanciarlo magari con qualche banlist che impedisca a mazzi come il Solfaccordo e il Fiore Cardian di OTKappare? Nono è vero, meglio mettere le poche carte che li contrastano a ULTRA e spargerle in pacchetti diversi. Poi se shoppi e sei un senzavita che non conosce cosa significhi mescolare un mazzo nella vita vera va bene, capisco che ritieni schifezze come questo gioco come "belle", ma se siete dei giocatori che voglion divertirsi facendo una partita a Yu-Gi-Oh! andate alla fumetteria più vicina e duellate dal vivo, ci si diverte di più e soprattutto non si hanno mani megascriptate per farti perdere (seriamente, avere tutti e 3 i diapason fiamma nel mazzo in mano con richiamo diapason e pescare sempre altri diapason è ridicolo, non venitemi a dire che è costruito male il mazzo perché è un tentativo patetico di proteggere un gioco schifoso a spada tratta). Ultima nota, dolente ovviamente, è il discorso Abilità: non per come funzionano, alla fine è il modo che ha il gioco per rendersi unico, ma per il loro bilanciamento. Paragonando due personaggi come Crowler e Yubel sarà più facile capire: Crowler ha un massimo di Abilità che consente di evocare SENZA TRIBUTI Golem Ingranaggio Antico E immediatamente dopo posizionare una Polimerizzazione presa AL DI FUORI del deck. In breve potete evocare il Golem Megatonico al primo turno, in alternativa avrete un mostro che ha 3000 punti e che attaccando impedisce l'attivazione delle carte coperte, con danno perforante. Con Yubel invece? Semplicemente mescolate una delle forme di Yubel dalla mano nel vostro mazzo per tirare fuori quella originale sempre dal vostro mazzo. Fate voi i conti, anche se c'è ben poco da capire.



Voto: 3/10, abbassato a un 1/10 per la strafottenza di Konami nell'ignorare questi problemi aggiornando costantemente il gioco

review: I would for sure recommend this game. I am definitely not that good at this game compared to some of the people in ranked and I will admit I don't like having to sit around for 5 minutes waiting for combo players to end their turn. However, as a person that hasn't spent a single dime on this game, it is still very satisfying and possible to build an ultimate deck that reflects a characters anime cards. I am definitely not even close to getting everything in the game, but it doesn't feel that boring to grind.

review:
Para quem jogou o Yu-Gi-Oh, TCG e OCG, esse é estranho demais, é um jogo completamente diferente, os personagens tem poderes. Essa versão da Steam nada mais é que um celular na tela do seu PC, portabilidade ridicula, pesada e mal otimizada. 

Além da empresa deste jogo ser uma FDP, que não respeita o consumidor. Se você gastou dinheiro com esse jogo eu tenho pena de você. 

Como joguei poucas horas porque não aquentei deixo aqui a opinião de um cara com mais de mil horas.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970772687', 'num_games_owned': 34, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 18331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4890, 'last_played': 1686910514}
review:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links,posso dizer que este é um dos melhores jogos de cartas que já joguei. A jogabilidade é muito fiel ao jogo de cartas físico, com todas as mecânicas e estratégias intactas, e a interface é bem projetada e fácil de usar.

O jogo oferece uma ampla variedade de cartas, incluindo cartas clássicas e mais recentes, o que permite aos jogadores criar decks personalizados e experimentar diferentes estratégias. O modo campanha é envolvente e oferece muitas horas de jogo, com muitas batalhas emocionantes contra personagens icônicos da série Yu-Gi-Oh!.

O modo online também é muito bem feito, permitindo aos jogadores enfrentar outros jogadores em batalhas épicas. A comunidade do jogo é ativa e engajada, com muitos torneios e eventos organizados pelos jogadores.

Os gráficos e efeitos sonoros são de alta qualidade, com todas as animações e efeitos sonoros icônicos do anime Yu-Gi-Oh!. A trilha sonora é empolgante e envolvente, adicionando ainda mais emoção às batalhas.

Em termos de problemas técnicos, o jogo pode ter algumas falhas ocasionais, mas nada que estrague a experiência geral de jogo. Além disso, alguns jogadores podem achar o jogo um pouco difícil de aprender no início, especialmente aqueles que não estão familiarizados com o jogo de cartas físico.

Em resumo, como jogador do jogo Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, recomendo este jogo para todos os fãs do anime Yu-Gi-Oh! e jogadores de cartas em geral. Com uma jogabilidade fiel, uma ampla variedade de cartas e modos de jogo envolventes, este jogo é um verdadeiro deleite para os fãs da franquia.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047379269', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 5638, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 416, 'last_played': 1691237194}
review:
Si os explico como he acabado jugando a este juego no os lo vais a creer , 
Un chatarrero de mi barrio encontró un mazo de cartas físicas unas 300, como no sabía mucho sobre ellas , me dijo si podía buscar cuanto valían... resulta que muchas eran falsas (sin holograma) y otras verdaderas ,  una de ellas valía como 400 euros .

Antes de eso no conocía estos juegos de cartas y eso que joven no soy, pues  por culpa de mi colega me he metido de lleno en esto y es una pasada , no sabía ni que había un aplicación en Steam para poder jugarlo.

A mi esto me parece increible y me  estoy viciado a esto de las cartas yugioh y pienso comprar algunas cartas de verdad para jugar en familia  (Mucho mejor que ver la televisión)

Si eres nuevo en esto te recomiendo que no te instales este juego , es pura droga "pal' celebro"  , no la instales , te estoy diciendo que pases de largo y no la instales....

Mira que te lo he avisado...... 

Pues nada  ahora te vas  a viciar como un perro .... la próxima vez haz caso de las reseñas de los demás.

Abrir sobrecitos es la auténtica salud , sobre todo cuando te sale esa carta ultrarara. 

Los seres humanos somos adictos al azar , nos encanta eso de que nos pueda tocar un premio no tenemos remedio...

Si puedes comprate las cartas de verdad y sal a juega con tus amigos en la playa o en la piscina o en una terraza que es mas sano que estar pegado a un ordenador en un habitación oscura.

Un abrazo amigo  o amiga .

author: {'steamid': '76561198059551616', 'num_games_owned': 360, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 25094, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 823, 'playtime_at_review': 9332, 'last_played': 1712272223}
review:
"Duel Links" es un juego de cartas que combina diferentes series de la franquicia [i]Yu-Gi-Oh![/i] en un formato rápido con todos los tipos de invocaciones conocidos hasta la fecha.

El tablero consta de 3 espacios para cartas mágicas/de trampa/péndulo, 3 para monstruos (más 2 para invocaciones realizadas por fusión, sincronía o enlace) y 1 para hechizos de campo. Esto va acompañado del mazo que puede ser de 20 a 30 cartas con uno extra de 8 como máximo.

Lo más interesante son las habilidades de cada protagonista. Estas pueden alterar o ignorar reglas, como si fuera un duelo del anime donde cada personaje hace lo que quiere.

Se puede armar una gran variedad de mazos con las recompensas de los eventos y las monedas diarias pero si quieren jugar a nivel competitivo van a tener que invertir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198858640541', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 443, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 443, 'last_played': 1684175228}
review:
* kein Spielspaß da einen Suchtis komplett zerstören
* alte Gens haben massiven Nachteil gegenüber Neueren, die erst ab gefühlt 500 Spielstunden freigeschalten werden, da die Neuen viel mehr overpowerde Effekte haben
* Loadingscreen-Simulator 2.0 wegen ewig verschachtelten Ketteneffekten
* demotiviert massivst und macht keinen Spaß mehr im Gegensatz zu früher

(Spielstunden am Handy damals: um die 100 wschl)

[u]Produktidee im Office war bei dem Spiel:[/u]
Lasst uns ein Spiel entwickeln, bei dem jede Generation gegeneinander kämpfen kann,dadurch  die Neueren viel mehr Effekte+Möglichkeiten haben, die alten Gens deswegen komplett zerstören und somit die süchtigen Kids ohne Sozialleben einen massiven Vorteil gegenüber denen haben, die es nur zum Spaß ab und an spielen.
[b]Kurz und knapp:[/b] jungfräuliche Asiaten fi´´en dich kreuz und quer übers Spielfeld, da die ihr leben hier reinstecken und trotz Rang "Amateur" dích Hops nehmen. Die hundertausend verschachtelten Ketteneffekte in den neuen Gens macht das Spiel zum Loading Simulator und demotiviert einen massivst.

author: {'steamid': '76561199256622498', 'num_games_owned': 15, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1684502085}
review:
В общем, ребята:

~Рецепт картошечки по-деревенски~
Берем:
- 1кг картошки (желательно крупной и не разваристой)
- соль (желательно не из Питера);
- перчик молотой черный;
- паприку сладкую;
- тмин;
- кориандр;
- итальянские травы (или орегано)
!дополнительно, при наличии! : гранатовый соус

Чистим нашу картошечку, промываем, нарезаем длинными дольками в форме полумесяца (только, достаточно, тупого) и закидываем в достаточно большую кастрюльку, наливаем водички, чтобы вся картошечка была погружена и варим. Варить примерно 10 минут после закипания, убавив огонь! После сливаем воду и остужаем практически полностью, чтобы она была чуть теплой!

Готовим заправку: смешиваем все специи (каждую по пол чайной ложечки), а соли, примерно, чайную ложку без горки и наливаем 3 ст. ложки подсолнечного масла (не дезодорированное). Если есть гранатовый соус - налейте 2 ст. ложки, так картошечка будет кисло-сладенькой, очень вкусной ♥
Далее хорошо перемешиваем сие зелье и выливаем на остывшую картошечку. Сразу же накрываем крышкой и хорошенько трясем картошку приблизительно минуту, чтобы специи равномерно распределились. ВАЖНО: Не мешайте ее сильно, чтобы не превратить дольки в пюре!

Ставим духовку на 190°. Готовим противень: просто выстилаем на него фольгу. Выкладываем картошечку на противень (выкладывайте так, чтобы дольки не касались друг друга), и отправляем в духовку на 20-30 минут (в зависимости от духовки). Готовность поймете по ярко-румяной, суховатой корочке.

Под данную игрушку только с закусками сидеть!

P.S. Если хотите картошечку не по-деревенски, просто замените соль на Питерскую.

Приятной игры и приятного аппетита! ♥

author: {'steamid': '76561199172462553', 'num_games_owned': 1, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 9400, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6306, 'last_played': 1700713045}
review:
Duel links é um jogo de cartas de monstro jogáveis no anime yugioh.
Tem uma proposta diferente do TCG. No duellinks as zonas de monstros e armadilhas são reduzidas a 3 pra cada. Também os pontos de vida iniciam em 4000 e não em 8000 como de costume. O jogo tem uma proposta baseada em diversos mundos, onde o jogador pode viajar por esse incrível universo. 
O jogo é extremamente cativante e divertido.

author: {'steamid': '76561198995290354', 'num_games_owned': 9, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 19325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18142, 'last_played': 1707873487}
review:
Como un fanático que no es tan fanático de Yu-Gi-Oh desde hace algún tiempo, no pude resistirme a probar Yu-Gi-Oh Duel Links, y debo decir que, en su mayor parte, ¡no me ha decepcionado! La experiencia de sumergirse en el mundo de Yu-Gi-Oh a través de este juego es simplemente genial, especialmente con la nostalgia que trae consigo.

La jugabilidad es sólida y casi fiel al juego de cartas original, con una gran variedad de cartas y estrategias para explorar. Los duelos son emocionantes y bien equilibrados en su mayor parte, lo que ofrece una experiencia competitiva gratificante.

Sin embargo, debo señalar que el juego puede inclinarse hacia el lado del "P2W" (pagar para ganar) en ocasiones. Como jugador completamente F2P (Free to Play), noté que a veces me encontraba en desventaja frente a aquellos que estaban dispuestos a invertir dinero en el juego. Esto puede resultar frustrante en ocasiones, especialmente cuando te enfrentas a oponentes con decks muy poderosos que parecen inalcanzables para los jugadores que no pagan.

A pesar de este inconveniente y de que puedes tal vez llegar a tener un deck como el que ellos tienen si te empeñas en pasar mucho tiempo jugando y recolectando gemas (Lo cual también es un poco dificíl), aún así puedo decir que disfruté mucho de Yu-Gi-Oh Duel Links. La experiencia de juego en general es divertida y adictiva, especialmente para los jugadores de Yu-Gi-Oh como yo. Si puedes pasar por alto el aspecto ocasional de P2W y simplemente disfrutar del juego por lo que es, definitivamente vale la pena probarlo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198159490603', 'num_games_owned': 107, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 34693, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33214, 'last_played': 1711125148}
review:
Pretty fun and noob friendly, if you played as a kid, only watched the original show oreven if you are new to the franchise, the game have plenty tutorials and ways to get cards, you can get anything for free if you play enough (not even that much) and the updates and events help to keep the game alive.
Thanks to the character's abilities mostly of the old archetypes are at least playable and even competitive, and the speed duels makes it dynamic to play and test without being time consuming.
Pretty much everything in the game is good and a really nice experience (even better if you start to play with a friend to test yourselves meanwhile you progress).
Everything's good, except pendulum monsters, f*uck those guys.

author: {'steamid': '76561198170210835', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2472, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2286, 'last_played': 1682888941}
review: I love the voice overs from the original voice actors. this game experience is a welcome alternative to duel masters and irl dueling!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198294600465', 'num_games_owned': 46, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 11543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11543, 'last_played': 1637016155}
review:
Como uma pessoa que ama Yu-Gi-Oh desde a infância e que jogou 192 horas (apenas na Steam) e muito mais horas pelo celular, posso dizer que o jogo é divertido, bem feito e tem potencial, porém a gana por dinheiro fez desse jogo um gacha que se preocupa em mudar o meta constantemente fazendo jogadores caseiros sofrerem e jogadores com grana a torrarem seus salários para terem sempre um deck bom e que te faça subir de "elo". Se você é o tipo de pessoa que não liga de despejar seu salário num joguinho constantemente, então jogue. Mas todos sabemos que isso não é saudável pra ninguém, então com isso em mente, me sinto no dever de dizer que NÃO RECOMENDO o jogo. Se você como eu, ama Yu-gi-oh, então recomendo que jogue o card game físico ou procure outros jogos da franquia.

(Obs: Só abro esse jogo pra jogar de vez em quando com uns 5 ou 6 decks que suei pra conseguir jogando esporadicamente, sem gastar dinheiro nenhum, então não estranhem se minhas horas de jogo aumentarem mais que 192 horas). =D

author: {'steamid': '76561198357485745', 'num_games_owned': 198, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 715, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 715, 'last_played': 1682689131}
review: Das Spiel war für ein Gratis Game gut und hat Spaß gemacht weil man ohne den ganzen neuen Link Pendel Quatsch spielen konnte. Diese Tage sind leider vorbei. Ein Zug des Gegners dauert jetzt 5 Minuten und er beschwört 10 Monster hintereinander. Ein Duell ist sofort entschieden da das Glück der Karten für diese neuen Karten nicht mehr benötigt wird. Die Texte der neuen Karten sind länger als manche Bücher für die man studiert haben muss um sie zu verstehen. Früher gingen Duelle 5-10 Minuten und es gab bestimmt über 20 Runde. Jetzt dauert das Duell 15 Minuten und besteht aus maximal 5 Runden. Das macht einfach keinen Spaß mehr. Ich bin sehr eintäuscht das dass Spiel diesen Weg gegangen ist. Und mal ganz im Ernst was zum f*** ist ein LINK Monster, ich wollte ein Spiel spielen und nicht studieren.

author: {'steamid': '76561198419582219', 'num_games_owned': 26, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1682268337}
review:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links is an incredibly fun and addicting game that will have you hooked for hours on end. Whether you're a longtime fan of the Yu-Gi-Oh! franchise or new to the game, Duel Links offers an engaging and accessible experience that is both challenging and rewarding.

One of the standout features of Duel Links is the game's intuitive and streamlined gameplay mechanics. The game's rules are easy to learn, yet there's still a surprising amount of depth to the strategy and tactics involved in winning duels. The game also features a wide variety of cards, each with its own unique effects and abilities, allowing you to customize your deck to your liking.

Another great aspect of Duel Links is the game's stunning visuals and sound design. The card designs are gorgeous and faithfully capture the essence of the Yu-Gi-Oh! franchise, while the music and sound effects add to the immersive experience of the game.

In addition, the game offers a wealth of content to keep you engaged for hours on end. The single-player campaign features a variety of challenges and missions, while the multiplayer mode allows you to compete against other players from around the world.

Overall, Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links is a fantastic game that is both fun and challenging. With its intuitive gameplay mechanics, stunning visuals, and wealth of content, it's a must-play for fans of the Yu-Gi-Oh! franchise and anyone looking for a fun and addicting card game.

review:
I played this game for 115 hours 
This game is fun but it doesn't replicate the normal Trading Card Game ( TCG ) with 5 monster slots to summon in or the 5 spells / traps 5 slots to set / activate a card , it's introducing new thing to the game ( skills ) it did add some fun bit it takes the part of the game where the cards do every thing also the the cards limits in one deck is NOT 40 minimum the same thing with Extra deck which is NOT 15 cards and above all that there are really to try to make you buy there products almost in  every package presented have an offer to use money instead if gems also there are no way to get red of the duplicated cards and get new cards instead , the game have so many cards of Yu-Gi-Oh banned while the TCG doesn't banned them 
the game have decent way to introduce you to the new mechanic about the cards , you can have some decent game playing against bots outside of the (competitive play against online players) with so many characters in all Of Yu-Gi-Oh anime except the last anime (Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens)

author: {'steamid': '76561199092511494', 'num_games_owned': 3, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3566, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3118, 'last_played': 1693654895}
review:
The card art, gameplay, and just about everything else about this game will bring back memories if you're a fan of the series. It is one of the top strategy games I've ever played. Even  if you've never watched the anime, you still get to see new cards and how they function

But the game's remarkable variety is what really caught my attention. There are a tonne of cards to collect and experiment with, from old favourites to brand-new additions that give the game a completely new level of strategy. Speaking about strategy, the gameplay is very entertaining; while it is simple to pick up, mastering it is an entirely different challenge.

Additionally, the game often releases updates and hosts events to keep things interesting, so there's always something to look forward to.

Overall, if you love card games in general or are a fan of the franchise, I'd say Yu-Gi-Oh Duel Links is certainly worth your time, considering I have 50+ hours on it, and nothing can compare to the joy of creating a powerful deck and winning games.

"Duel Links F2P" Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links New Player Guide:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DfPXZWg_Q1A

author: {'steamid': '76561198801037867', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 373, 'playtime_forever': 549, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1706736661}
review:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links - это бесплатная карточная игра, основанная на популярной аниме-серии "Yu-Gi-Oh!". Игра доступна на ПК, а также на мобильных устройствах. В Duel Links игроки сражаются в роли персонажей из сериала, используя свои колоды карт для сбивания очков противника.

Одной из главных особенностей игры является ее современный геймплей, который отличается от оригинальной карточной игры Yu-Gi-Oh!. Карты были изменены для более быстрого и удобного игрового процесса, что делает игру доступной для новичков.

Игроки могут собирать колоды из более чем 9 000 карт, выбирая различные стратегии и комбинации для победы. Игроки также могут улучшать свои колоды и участвовать в различных событиях, которые проводятся в игре.

Графика игры выполнена в стиле аниме и она имеет высокое качество. Игра имеет множество режимов, включая сюжетный режим и режим PvP, где игроки могут сражаться друг с другом. В игре также присутствуют боссы, которые можно победить, чтобы получить новые карты и улучшить свою колоду.

Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links также имеет свою систему кланов, где игроки могут объединяться и работать вместе, чтобы достичь общей цели. Кланы могут участвовать в событиях и сражаться друг с другом, чтобы увеличить свой рейтинг.

В целом, Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links - это отличная карточная игра, которая привлекает игроков своей быстрой и удобной игровой механикой, а также множеством возможностей для создания и улучшения своей колоды. Современный стиль и высококачественная графика делают игру привлекательной для поклонников аниме и карточных игр.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999471102', 'num_games_owned': 447, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 2603, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2568, 'last_played': 1681447034}
review:
Die neuen Teile(MasterDual,etc.) sind zwar alle Optisch sehr schön gestaltet und animiert doch die ganzen neuen Karten und Arten sind nix für mich.

Ich bin kein Fan von Links,Dings,Syncs und anderes gedüngst.
Lieber dann beim guten alten Klassiker stiel bleiben.
Natürlich kann man hier das auch aber es gibt eine Spate der guten alten YuGiOh Zeit.

Das Overlay ist etwas gewöhnungsbedürftig zumal mit den 3 Feldern nur aber kein Problem.
Ich denke gerne an die Zeit zurück wo ich Forbidden Memories auf der PS1 gespielt habe...
